channel.title: Authors on Ruodan Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Ruodan Zhang

item.description: I am a social scientist specializing in nonprofit management and volunteerism. My broader research agenda explores why citizens participate and persist in the public sphere. My research examines how nonprofit-government interactions and organizational practices, such as diversity management, training, and recognition, affect individual participation and persistence in nonprofit-type activities. My work has been published in Nonprofit Management & Leadership, Asian Journal of Political Science. I expect to earn a Ph.D. in Public Affairs from the Oâ€™Neill School, Indiana University-Bloomington in May 2020.
